data.comment: The match is underway at Stadion.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andreas Ekberg signals a Helsingborg throw-in in Malmo's half.
Andreas Ekberg awards Malmo a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Andreas Ekberg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Helsingborg's Mix Diskerud has run offside.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg.
In the minute 11, Andreas Ekberg blows against Helsingborg's Brandur Hendriksson for offside.
Free kick for Malmo in the half of Helsingborg.
Free kick Malmo.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Malmo.
Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Helsingborg.
In Malmo Malmo attack through Ola Toivonen. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Stadion.
In the minute 17, Jo Inge Berget (Malmo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Malmo are coming forward and Jo Inge Berget gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Erdal Rakip of Malmo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 20, Helsingborg have a goal kick.
Malmo are whistled for offside.
Can Helsingborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
In the minute 22, Malmo are pushing forward but Ola Toivonen's finish is wide of the goal.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
Andreas Ekberg awards Helsingborg a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Helsingborg push forward at Stadion and Assad Al Islam Al Hamlawi gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Malmo defence.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Malmo.
Anders Randrup (Helsingborg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 25, It's advantage Malmo in Malmo as Jo Inge Berget scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg.
Helsingborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 30, Martin Olsson (Helsingborg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anel Ahmedhodzic (Malmo) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 34, Helsingborg's Max Svensson is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
An attacking Helsingborg player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 36, Anthony van den Hurk scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
Ola Toivonen hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Malmo.
Free kick for Helsingborg in the half of Malmo.
In the minute 38, Free kick Helsingborg.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Helsingborg territory.
In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 40, Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
Throw-in Malmo.
Helsingborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Helsingborg's half?
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Franz Brorsson is on target to give Malmo a 2-1 advantage.
Great play from Eric Larsson to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Anders Christiansen is replacing Erdal Rakip for the home team.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Stadion.
In the minute 49, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Isaac Thelin for Malmo is whistled offside.
Helsingborg's Armin Gigovic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Malmo defender.
In the minute 52, Andreas Ekberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Helsingborg in the half of Malmo.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
In the minute 54, Helsingborg's Armin Gigovic breaks free at Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Malmo have a goal kick.
Malmo drive forward but Isaac Thelin is judged offside.
In the minute 56, Armin Gigovic is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Helsingborg's Armin Gigovic is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 59, Helsingborg to take a throw-in in Malmo territory.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
Martin Olsson of Helsingborg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 62, Malmo's Anders Christiansen gets in a shot on goal at Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Goal! Malmo extend their lead to 3-1 thanks to a Anel Ahmedhodzic header.
In the minute 62, That's a fine assist from Ola Toivonen.
Assad Al Islam Al Hamlawi for Helsingborg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Malmo.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Malmo in the half of Helsingborg.
Jon Dahl Tomasson is making the team's second substitution at Stadion with Adi Nalic replacing Amin Sarr.
Bonke Innocent is replacing Fouad Bachirou for Malmo at Stadion.
In the minute 68, Olof Mellberg (Helsingborg) is making a first substitution, with Alex Timossi Andersson replacing Brandur Hendriksson.
Jo Inge Berget for Malmo drives towards goal at Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
In the minute 71, In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Helsingborg's Max Svensson misses with an attempt on goal.
Andreas Ekberg awards Malmo a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 73, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adi Nalic (Malmo) has received a yellow card from Andreas Ekberg.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
The away team have replaced Anthony van den Hurk with Rasmus Jonsson. This is the second substitution made today by Olof Mellberg.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Free kick Malmo.
Malmo drive upfield and Anders Christiansen gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Helsingborg defender.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Jonas Knudsen with Behrang Safari.
Andreas Ekberg signals a Helsingborg throw-in in Malmo's half.
In the minute 84, In Malmo Malmo drive forward through Adi Nalic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Olof Mellberg is making the team's third substitution at Stadion with Alhaji Gero replacing Assad Al Islam Al Hamlawi.
The away team have replaced Jakob Voelkerling Persson with Ludvig Carlius. This is the fourth substitution made today by Olof Mellberg.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Malmo.
Throw-in Malmo.
Helsingborg's Mix Diskerud misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Malmo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Helsingborg are pushing forward but Anders Randrup's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
So close for Malmo as Isaac Thelin's shot comes back off the post.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-1.
Goal! Isaac Thelin extends Malmo's lead to 4-1.
